entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 12:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
